body: I reallty hope the English version comes soon!  This is one of the only 2 Chijoku AN manga's that haven't been translated yet.  Can't wait!

I wonder if this is related to the other story, the girl looks a lot like the heiress that somehow made the other guy "lose his dick" or something, also the little futa sister seems to be there too... then again, this is an artist that kinda recycles the same style/stories so I have no idea if this is a prequel/sequel/or just reusing the same looking characters
